name: Square'd
description:
Square'd is a 3D minimalist platformer runner game.

You control a red square trying to avoid being halted by the obstacles in your path and your goal is to reach the end.

It is meant to test your reflexes, reaction, and focus, as each level increases difficulty as you progress.

The inspiration is from the game "Geometry Dash" and the idea of turning it into 3D.

Note: Some levels may appear too difficult, however, these are made sure to still be beatable.

Can you beat all 20 levels?

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The first game made by me - Croix Stu Lapore.

Donations are greatly appreciated as it supports me and helps me to continue doing what I love. 

I am sincerely grateful to those who may have played my game even for just giving it a try.
